footer.description: Your trusted partner for comprehensive dental care. We provide exceptional dental services with a focus on comfort, quality, and patient satisfaction.

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Dedicated to providing exceptional dental care with compassion, expertise, and the latest technology for over 25 years.
about.storyParagraph1: Dental Center Zebekov – founded in 1998 by Dr. Toshko Zebekov, began with a simple yet powerful vision: to provide top‑quality dental care that combines advanced technology with genuine compassion.
about.storyParagraph2: What started as a small practice in Strumica has grown into a leading dental center in southeastern North Macedonia, serving thousands of patients across two convenient locations. Our commitment to excellence never wavers, and we continue to invest in the latest technology and training to ensure our patients receive the very best care.
about.storyParagraph3: Today, we are proud to be recognized as leaders in dental innovation, offering comprehensive services from routine cleanings to complex surgical procedures—all delivered with the personal touch that has made us a trusted name in Macedonian dentistry.
about.valuesSubtitle: These core values guide everything we do and shape the exceptional experience we provide to every patient.

patientCenteredCare.title: Patient-Centered Care
patientCenteredCare.description: Every decision we make is focused on what's best for our patients' health and comfort.

qualitySafety.title: Quality & Safety
qualitySafety.description: We maintain the highest standards of quality and safety in all our treatments.

professionalExcellence.title: Professional Excellence
professionalExcellence.description: Our team continuously updates their skills to provide the most advanced care.

continuousLearning.title: Continuous Learning
continuousLearning.description: We stay at the forefront of dental innovation through ongoing education.

modernTechnology.title: Modern Technology
modernTechnology.description: State-of-the-art equipment and latest dental innovations

about.journeySubtitle: From humble beginnings to becoming Macedonia's leading dental practice, here's our story of growth and innovation.
about.achievementsSubtitle: We're proud of our achievements and commitment to providing the highest quality dental care.
about.joinDescription: Get in touch with us to schedule an appointment and become part of our family of satisfied patients.

2008.title: Foundation
2008.description: Dr. Toshko Zebekov established the first clinic in Strumica with a vision to provide world-class dental care.

2012.title: Expansion
2012.description: Opened our second location in Novo Selo to serve more patients in the region.

2016.title: Technology Upgrade
2016.description: Invested in state-of-the-art dental equipment and digital imaging systems.

2020.title: Team Growth
2020.description: Expanded our team to include specialists in orthodontics and oral surgery.

2024.title: Innovation Leader
2024.description: Recognized as a leading dental center with over 5000 happy patients.

services.title: Our
services.subtitle: Comprehensive dental care tailored to your individual needs. From routine checkups to complex procedures, we provide the highest quality treatment.

dentalMedicine.name: General Dentistry
dentalMedicine.description: Comprehensive dental care including checkups, cleanings, fillings, and routine checkups.

aestheticDentistry.name: Aesthetic Dentistry
aestheticDentistry.description: Transform your smile with our advanced cosmetic dental procedures and treatments.

orthodontics.name: Orthodontics
orthodontics.description: Straighten your teeth and improve your bite with modern orthodontic solutions.

oralSurgery.name: Oral Surgery
oralSurgery.description: Advanced surgical procedures including wisdom teeth removal and dental implants.

implantology.name: Implantology
implantology.description: Replace missing teeth with durable, natural-looking dental implants.

prostheticDentistry.name: Prosthetic Dentistry
prostheticDentistry.description: Restore your smile with custom-made crowns, bridges, and dentures.

xrayDiagnostics.name: X-Ray Diagnostics
xrayDiagnostics.description: Advanced imaging for accurate diagnosis and treatment planning.

services.whyChooseSubtitle: Our patients choose us for our commitment to quality, comfort, and personalized care.

advancedTechnology.title: Advanced Technology
advancedTechnology.description: Latest dental equipment and digital systems for precise and efficient treatments.

personalizedCare.title: Personalized Care
personalizedCare.description: Tailored treatments according to your individual needs and goals.

expertTeam.title: Expert Team
expertTeam.description: Experienced dentists with decades of experience and continuous education.

flexibleScheduling.title: Flexible Scheduling
flexibleScheduling.description: Working hours that adapt to your schedule, including Saturday appointments.

services.readyDescription: your smile and provide you with exceptional dental care.

locations.title: Our
locations.subtitle: Conveniently located in Strumica and Novo Selo, we're here to serve your dental care needs.
locations.mapSubtitle: Conveniently located in Strumica and Novo Selo for easy access
locations.visitDescription: Come to one of our locations for exceptional dental care

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us to schedule your appointment or ask any questions about our services.
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to schedule your appointment.
